website_summaries.verdict: A set of eight stones that come packaged in a beautiful wooden box. A great host or hostess gift.
pros: The stones are well-packaged and come with two thick-walled quality glasses
The stones are smooth and work well to chill any beverage
An affordable price and 1-year warranty make the set a great value
cons: The stones and glasses are a little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: but it still looks nice. Hope my boyfriend likes it
customer_reviews.text: lol I don't know anything about whiskey glasses but this ones are small, but it still looks nice. Hope my boyfriend likes it
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: The stones keep your liquid nice and cool for leisurely sipping
customer_reviews.text: First , the usual fast Amazon delivery 👍🏻 Second the shot glasses are big enough to hold 2 stones and still get a full shot plus some. The stones keep your liquid nice and cool for leisurely sipping, good for 3 shots , then just replace stones and continue sipping 👍🏻Third , there’s many complaints about the boxes quality, so what , I put my glasses on a shelf and the stones in the freezer, the box I’ll lacquer and use it for a stash box. Last buy it for yourself, not just a gift !
customer_reviews.author: kevin jacobs

customer_reviews.title: this profuct does not function as advertised
customer_reviews.text: If these are meant to replace ice cubes without diluting the whiskey they fall miserably short. My whiskey and the rocks were room temperature in less than 10 minutes despite being in the freezer for weeks. Shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something different, affordable, unique and with a nice presentation to be placed in a bourbon basket that I am making for a gift. These are very neatly packaged and have that wow factor that goes with the rest of the items I put in the basket. I love the little wooden box! My last basket had the glasses that were just placed in a cardboard box and two of the glasses broke in transport. I don’t have to worry about that with these. I do wish the glasses were a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift to give to any whisky drinker
customer_reviews.text: These were a great gift for my husband who is a huge bourbon fan. The stones stay cold for a long time and the box it all comes in was really nice. The only thing I was surprised about was how small the glasses were. I did come to find out you do not need a lot of bourbon just a taste so it makes sense why they are so small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small glasses
customer_reviews.text: This was suppose to be a gift for my husband for our 15yr anniversary being as that is supposedly the “Chrystal year”. Unfortunately the pictures look way better than the actual product. The whiskey glasses are more like shot glasses as they are pretty tiny. And the glasses don’t look or feel like nice Chrystal. My glasses came dirty and dingy looking. Now I’ll have to get my husband drunk BEFORE I give him the whisky (shot) glasses. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Please note these are shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Imagine the look on my face when I open this and see mini items :-) I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, a whiskey lover, so I thought it would be perfect. *They ARE perfect, but it is not what I thought I was purchasing! All on me for not paying attention to the direct description of the product...but very good quality! Still a great gift! Packaged very nice and the box is good to keep for storing or traveling.
customer_reviews.author: jazmine

customer_reviews.title: good gift but smaller than it looks on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but was underwhelmed by the small size of everything. The box, glasses and stones looked to be larger when in reality the glasses are shot glass size. I will have to pay closer attention to the description.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular, much much better than I expected, perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular, much much better than I expected. Perfect father's day, birthday, or groomsmen's gift. Feels substantial and fancy. This is definitely going to be my go-to gift in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kaha

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gift set.... glasses are smaller..just fyi
customer_reviews.text: The little box is light but looks nice. The glasses themselves are smaller than expected but I may have misread the description. They are not your standard size glasses..but smaller. Maybe whisky glasses are this size normally? I wouldn't know as I am giving this as a gift. Anyway... the presentation is great, the stones seem nice and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: From the description you would think these are normal size whiskey glasses and whiskey stones but when I received them they are the size of double shot glasses and the whiskey rocks were a little bigger than sugar cubes, really disappointed because this was a gift for my brother. I'm glad he laughed about it and now uses them as shot glasses
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gift Set
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with how quickly this “whiskey: stones and glass” set was sent to me. The packaging is amazing, great quality, and looks absolutely fabulous. I can’t wait to gift this to my brother and get some feedback, but I am more than sure he will be pleased with this gift set. I am very happy about this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone who isn’t sure what to buy their brother(s).
customer_reviews.author: Lolia

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift, made for a happy husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my whiskey loving husband. It comes in a nice wooden box, good for storing the stones and glasses. The glasses were smaller than I thought they would be, but honestly it's probably perfect for the amount of whiskey usually poured.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who likes a little whiskey drink now and then. These work great get cold fast and stay cold without watering down your drink. The glasses are cute and the box is a very nice touch to store everything in when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today. I like the looks of everything in the box. We'll see how everything holds up. I would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured in the wooden box is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, will fully review after the gift is given! For now I will say the box is awesome, and it is exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Graves

customer_reviews.title: Anniversary Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my Husband for our 15th Anniversary - since the Glasses were crystal. Very Happy with my selection
customer_reviews.author: maclynes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift...very impressive wood box. Only wish there had been instructions on how to use the rock..but looked it up online.

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: I adore this cute little kit. I gifted this for my husband for Father’s Day and he loved it. If only the glasses were a tad bit bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Gift

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are more like shot glasses. The cubes are tiny. Could probably choke on them if you're not careful. I mean, they do the deed, all I wanted was nice crystal cups for my alcoholic lifestyle. Just wish they were adult size.

customer_reviews.title: Cool boss gift

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this gift. Entire month of June is dedicated to him.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fall for the fake online pictures!
customer_reviews.text: These looked more like shot glasses than whiskey glasses (like shown in the video) False advertisement, very disappointed. Bought two of them for gifts with no time to get them something else so I had to use them and be embarrassed or else I would have totally returned these. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The shot glasses are very cute. These are small shot glasses with small stones.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Small, but amazing
customer_reviews.text: The box that these come in is nothing short of a miracle. Opening the box made me feel like I was opening a present again on christmas morning. But wait, there's more. The granite stones help sooth and cool down your drink. The glasses may be small, but nobody needs to have a jug full of it. Just do your thing and drink responsibly!

customer_reviews.text: This has a lot in this little box. My husband loved it.

I look forward to buy one more for myself.

customer_reviews.text: so rough. was not a qualitative gift for husband so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Wenwen Dong

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, nicely packaged and presented solid pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Father’s Day, this product was a great buy for him. He’s not your every day drinker, when he does have a glass he doesn’t want it watered down. Whiskey is hardly ever cold, ice takes away the flavor and waters it down. He uses 4-6 of them depending how quickly he wants it to get chilled, they work quite quickly that way. I would recommend this product, anyone that appreciates the full flavor of a nice glass or shot of whiskey, these are perfect. The glasses that come with the set are nicely made, the design on them makes it easier to hold since it isn’t completely smooth.
customer_reviews.author: anthony ijames

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea... great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as part of my Hubby’s birthday present. First of all let me say the box was awesome that it came in.. smelled amazing. The inside was nicely put together as well. My hubby LOVED it.. and later that night sipped his Evan Williams in one of his glassses. The marble ice cubes is a great idea..they come with this little velvet pouch so you can put in your freezer. So he’s able to drink it cold if he chooses without having it get watered down. I’m very satisfied with this set as was my hubby. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: Very small, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap to be honest. I should have known better as I have been duped into buying micro-items from Amazon before. The glasses are small, but it does say that in the description. The cubes are small as well and don’t retain the cold well. The box is some very cheap pine. The picture doesn’t have a scale in it, otherwise this size issue would have been easier to determine. I gifted it to my Dad already and he said he liked the smaller glasses for whiskey anyways as it’s more like a shot. So there’s that.
customer_reviews.author: Dragember

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: What is a Christmas gift for my father-in-law, he loved it like the small little glasses and light the granite stones to keep the whiskey cold. glasses were smaller than what we expected more along the lines of a shot glass. It's still a nice presentation and a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Quality exceeded expectations for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this gift. The glasses were smaller than expected but I should've read the description better. I was shocked at how good the quality of everything was considering the price. Definitely a great gift for the whiskey drinker in your life!!
customer_reviews.author: CountryMama777

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift. They're a gorgeous set, well cushioned inside the box, and they'll make a great presentation. Might have to buy some for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Petra R

customer_reviews.title: Would rate 0 stars if possible
customer_reviews.text: This product seems nice before the purchase, but when received it is a bitter disappointment. They do not tell you that the glasses are the size of a small pinky finger, they claim that the freezeable stones do not make the drink taste bad but it does. It makes the drink feel rancid. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mederos

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I realized, but that's on me!  They're great otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: A really nice quality product, which is exactly as described but I didn't look at it closely enough so that's my bad! :D Either way, if you're looking for SHOT glasses, they're beautiful and well designed. A wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Decent... read the size carefully
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the size of the cup or if I did I did not fully register the size. The glasses are really nice quality but are the size of a shot glass or slightly bigger-not really a sipping glass. My husband still liked it and uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

product_meta.title: Whiskey Stones and Glass Set - 8 Granite Chilling Whisky Rocks – 2 Crystal Shot Glasses in Wooden Box – Premium Bar Accessories for the Best Tasting Beverages
feature_bullets: ✔️ THE BEST GIFT FOR FRIENDS. The whiskey stones gift set is a best gift idea for friends present! The whiskey glass and stone set in a wooden box are a beautiful idea for any bar.

✔️ A CLEAN TASTING LIQUOR DRINK. Forget about watery whiskey, bourbon or other drinks. BROTEC whisky rocks stones provide coolness, without adding anything to your drink as ice does: no other tastes or smells, or water to change the taste of your favorite drink.

✔️ IDEAL COOLING. Put the whiskey ice stones in the freezer and you will get cold rocks, which awesomely cool your drink. Use the velvet bag (included in the kit) for the freezer so that the whiskey rocks don’t absorb other smells.

✔️ PREMIUM SET FOR REAL LOVERS OF GOOD DRINKS. 8 functional whiskey stones + 2 crystal whiskey shot glasses + 1 black velvet bag + stylish wooden box crafted with exquisite wood with a soft velvet pouch. The BROTEC whiskey stones and glass set makes a great beautiful gift idea.

✔️ 1 YEAR GUARANTEE OF MONEY BACK. The high quality of our whiskey stones and glasses is ensured by our customers. Soft ice cube sized whiskey chilling rocks/stones don’t scratch your glasses and are absolutely safe.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars582 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
